about:
Hi, I'm SBMous

I am a 13 year old student from England
I have played Minecraft since 1.2.5 and absolutely love it to death
My favorite gamemode is Nebula (DTM then CTW) followed by Control the Hill
My total time on steam games totals at near 1000 hours; however, this is nothing compared to the time I have spent on Minecraft
I am a pretty clever person, predicted high sevens and eights across the board at the end of year 9 (Avereage is level 6)
(For all you Americans out there, I apologize, the system conversion is very confusing)

I'll add more to this later. 
   See you around!
        SBMous
